file_content.text: Soon as everyone's aboard and settled, we'll be off. Thanks again for your help.
Boy. The Empire's surely going to hate the sound of your name for a while.
That's all the passengers, all right. You got them here safe; I'll get them offworld, like I promised.
I figure I owe you part of my commission for the help, so here you go.
Thank you. I'm just glad I could help.
I'm flattered.
Those people are glad, too. You've saved plenty of lives today.
I've got a long day ahead yet, settling folks in so we can get out of here. Take care of yourself.
Please, keep your money.
I--if you say so. Thanks kindly. Surely there's not enough good folks like you in the galaxy.
I owe you one. You ever need something, look me up and I'll try and settle the score.
Doesn't seem like much of a reward.
That's all I get?
I've given you what I could. I still have to pay my crew and bribe customs to get these folks settled.
I appreciate your help, but that's all I can do for you.
The sooner you get those passengers back, the better it'll go. Well-begun is half-done.
Get back aboard the Wanderlust, and keep the engines warm. I'll think of something.
If you say so, Captain, but I think it's foolish to wait....
I ain't interested in your thoughts, Rostoni. I said be ready to go--oh! Sorry, didn't hear you sneak up on me.
Name's Daven Tam. I'm running a charter for the Republic to get some "special passengers" offworld. Speaking of--I could surely use some help.
You're smuggling more than refugees and diplomats, aren't you?
Tell me about the passengers.
Any friend of the Republic is a friend of mine.
I'd be happy to help you.
I hoped you'd say that.
There a chance for action?
I think that's a safe bet. My passengers are trapped, and Imperial troops are attacking anyone who comes close.
The Empire's rounding up all the Force sensitives they can find. Anybody too weak to be Sith, they kill. So we're trying to grab them first.
Kids, old men... not exactly Jedi Master material. Now the Empire's sent a hunting party after them. Rostoni says he even saw Sith.
How many Sith did he see? How many Imperial troops?
Tell me what he saw.
He didn't stick around to count.
That doesn't make sense. If these people are so weak, they aren't a threat.
They kill Force sensitives?
And the Empire's out to see they remain that way.
That's why we're trying to move them out of the Empire's reach, or would be if they could get here.
Why can't you just land closer and get them out that way?
Don't you have a ship?
There's no way I'd get so close to the facility without getting shot down.
We're just a tramp freighter--fast, sure, but we're no good against a Sith.
I'm more than able to get these folks to their new home, but I need someone to get them past the Empire's goon squad, first. Any chance you can do it?
Your passengers will be safe from the Empire's claws.
It will be my pleasure to help.
The Empire can cast its net wide, but it will find nothing.
I'll bring them in safe.
The Empire's coming home empty-handed today.
I'll take care of it.
As one captain to another, I'm happy to help.
I'll help you out.
Enemy's surely out for blood, so you be careful.
Sure, I like a challenge.
Force sensitives are holed up in a research facility not far from here. Guide them back here, and keep 'em safe.
You do your part, and I'll get them off-planet where the Empire can't reach them.
Not likely. [Refuse quest]
Your kind of apathy is why the Empire gets away with atrocity.
Sorry, I'm not available for hire right now. Got a special contract I need to take care of first.
